Zoroastrianism ma ọ bụ Mazdayasna bụ okpukpe ndị Iran na otu n'ime okpukperechi kacha ochie n'ụwa, dabere na nkuzi nke onye amụma Zoroaster na-asụ Iran (nke a makwaara dị ka Zaraθuštra na Avestan ma ọ bụ Zartosht na Persian)
O nwere cosmology dualistic nke ihe ọma na ihe ọjọọ n'ime usoro nke monotheistic ontology na eschatology nke na-ebu amụma mmeri ikpeazụ nke ihe ọjọọ site na ezi ihe
Zoroastrianism na-ebuli chi amamihe nke emebeghị eke na nke dị mma nke a maara dị ka Ahura Mazda (lit
'Onyenwe nke Amamihe') dịka ihe kachasị elu

N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, ihe dị iche iche nke Zoroastrianism, dị ka monotheism ya, Mesaịa, nkwenye na nnwere onwe ime mkpebi na ikpe mgbe a nwụsịrị, echiche nke eluigwe, hel, ndị mmụọ ozi, na ndị mmụọ ọjọọ, n'etiti echiche ndị ọzọ, nwere ike imetụta usoro okpukpe na nkà ihe ọmụma ndị ọzọ, gụnyere  Okpukpe Abraham na Gnosticism, Buddhism Northern, na nkà ihe ọmụma Gris￼￼￼￼￼￼
